parameter.name: DefaultConnection-Web.config Connection String
parameter.description: DefaultConnection Connection String used in web.config by the application to access the database.

parameter.name: MyGallery-Web.config Connection String
parameter.description: MyGallery Connection String used in web.config by the application to access the database.
parameter.defaultValue: Data Source=(LocalDb)\MSSQLLocalDB;Initial Catalog=MyGallery; Pooling=false; Integrated Security=True
